about_the_game:
"Pathfinder RPG - Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Enormous Forest


The biggest Flip-Mats in history just got bigger! Introducing Pathfinder Flip-Mat: Enormous Forest, a brand-new amazingly giant Flip-Mat bigger than any Paizo has produced before! Measuring a titanic 30 by 46, this exciting new map presents a sprawling section of forest --One map is dense and primeval, and the other cut through with a shaded road just perfect for ambushing player characters. Your player character's biggest problems just got even bigger!

 NOTE:  This product has been made specifically for the Pathfinder ruleset, but can be used for 5E, Starfinder, or any ruleset supported by Fantasy Grounds

This product is not a PDF or accessible outside of Fantasy Grounds. It has been lovingly converted for use within Fantasy Grounds and Features the Following additions:
  • All maps resized and set up with a preset grid to make combats easy to manage
  • All the images and handouts from the book available to share with your players as you need them
"
